action.content:
Things are in different places, but the questioner does not know about it yet. Here is the situation:

WHAT: Things at places
LEFT: carbon
RIGHT: jacket
TOP: screwdriver
BOTTOM: elephant
CENTER: orchid
NORTHWEST: phosphorus
NORTHEAST: lipstick
SOUTHWEST: evening gown
SOUTHEAST: copper
HERE: saxophone
THERE: iron
NOWHERE: eye shadow
EVERYWHERE: eagle
INSIDE: hiking boots
OUTSIDE: passion fruit

Questions from the questioner will start with QUESTIONER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ANSWER: No<|im_end|><|im_end|> user
QUESTIONER: What is on your right?<|im_end|> user

ANSWER: Jacket<|im_end|><|im_end|> user
QUESTIONER: Is there anything above you?<|im_end|> user

ANSWER: Yes, screwdriver<|im_end|><|im_end|> user
QUESTIONER: What is to your immediate left?<|im_end|> user

ANSWER: Carbon<|im_end|><|im_end|> user
QUESTIONER: What is to your immediate right?<|im_end|>user
